thread.title: Mariah Carey enjoys holiday with Bryan Tanaka in Dubai | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Mariah Carey enjoys holiday with Bryan Tanaka in Dubai | Daily Mail Online

author: Jasmin Sahota For Mailonline
title: Mariah Carey enjoys holiday with Bryan Tanaka in Dubai | Daily Mail Online
text: Share 31 shares Featuring a semi-sheer panel, the skintight top showcased Mariah's taut tummy as she layered a chic white leather jacket over her fab figure. The star added inches to her height as she teetered in sky-high stilettos. When in Du-bae! The We Belong Together songstress looked in high spirits as she posed alongside her new beau Bryan Tanaka, who is 13 years her junior Loved-up: Clutching the dancer's hand, Mariah made her way through a mob of fans before posing in front of the world's tallest building Dressed to impress: The beauty ensured all eyes were on her as she donned a pair of figure-hugging jeans, slashed at the knees, which perfectly hugged her shapely legs The We Belong Together songstress looked in high spirits as she posed alongside her new beau Bryan Tanaka, who is 13 years her junior. The dancer echoed Mariah's simple yet stylish outfit opting for a camouflage print jacket and loose fitting jeans. Clutching her boyfriend's hand, Mariah made her way through a mob of fans before posing in front of the world's tallest building. The singer is currently enjoying a family holiday with her boyfriend and her five-year-old twins Moroccan and Monroe, who she shares with her ex-husband Nick Cannon. Ready for her close-up: The Hero hitmaker teased a slight glimpse of her ample assets as her black blouse cut into a deep-V across the chest, giving an eyeful of her famous curves Tourist time: Featuring a semi-sheer panel, the skintight top showcased Mariah's taut tummy as she layered a chic white leather jacket over her fab figure 'Dem kids!': The singer is currently enjoying a family holiday with her boyfriend and her five-year-old twins Moroccan and Monroe, who she shares with her ex-husband Nick Cannon The couple's appearance comes just days after the singer confirmed her relationship status during an interview with the Associated Press. 'I'm just going to be like, "I really don't talk about my personal life because that's what I used to do and it really worked for a minute, back, a while ago,"' she said. 'I just don't feel comfortable talking about my personal life... Me and my boyfriend don't want to do that,' she added. Mariah was previously engaged to Australian businessman and investor James Packer, and was married to rapper Nick Cannon for six years before they divorced in 2014. Diva: The star added inches to her height as she teetered in sky-high stilettos while she hid her eyes under cat-eye sunglasses Share or comment on this article 31
